name: HC Series - Colorado - Pig Tail Perfecto
additionalNotes: HC Series Cigars have exploded onto the scene by boasting superb blends at attractive prices. With a few well-deserved 90-plus ratings and top of the line quality, this hit-maker cigar brand is going nowhere soon. From Connecticut shade to dark and oily Maduros and everything in between, Havana Collection cigars houses a blend for every preferred taste under the sun.
